text:
0CJ 2 51957
/
October 22, 1957
National Association of Educational
Broadcasters
American Council on Education
1785 Massachusetts Avenue, H. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Gentlemen:
Would you please send me a copy of the research data concerning
administrative policy and production procedure of formal courses of
instruction by television. It was conpiled by James W. Sawyer and
Charles M. Woodliff.
It will be greatly appreciated.
Margaret L. Beck
Television Coordinator
MLB/jk
